HasData.summary: Checks if the provided table text exists.
HasData.remarks: If no table text: Clears the Next and Previous settings and keeps the CurrentRowIndex from moving.

UpdateLimitsFlags.summary: Updates the BeginningOfData and EndOfData flags.
UpdateLimitsFlags.remarks: Sets the CurrentRowIndex for the next or previous page and clears the IsNextPage or IsPrevPage flags.

UpdatePgeData.summary: Sets the form values before a detail submit and the page values before a page submit.

UpdateTableData.summary: Updates the CityTable ETable and Keys values.
